cleaned_text: Support Elderberry18.0ea How would you like to receive this item ? Description Emergen-C Immune Support Elderberry fizzy drink mix provides daily immune support infused with the natural goodness of botanicals! This great tasting Emergen-C Immune Support drink mix is packed with elderberry, natural fruit juice and flavors, vitamin C, and B vitamins. These drink packets are also vegetarian, gluten-free, and caffeine-free making the perfect addition to your holistic wellness routine and help support your immune system every day. Immune Support elderberry drink mix packets are made with 50 mg of elderberry and are infused with high potency vitamin C to support your immune system. These naturally sweetened drink powders are deliciously nutritional and make the perfect fit to your holistic approach to life. They are made from real elderberry and sunshine. Filled with the natural goodness of real botanicals, this vitamin C drink mix provides the perfect start to maintaining your health, supporting your immune system, and strengthening your body. Experience the power of Emergen-C Immune Support Elderberry fizzy drink mix, in a convenient pack of 18 sachets, perfect to take on the go! Made in USAges 14 and up, one (1) packet daily. Empty contents into a glass, add 46 oz. of water, stir. For lighter flavor, mix with more water. Do not exceed suggested use. ©GSK group of companies or its licensor IngredientsSugar, Juice Concentrate (Flavor), Glycine, L-Aspartic Acid, Natural Flavors, Rebaudioside A (Extracted and Purified from Natural Stevia Leaf), Silicon Dioxide, Tartaric Acid, Vegetable Concentrates (Carrot, Hibiscus) (Color) Nutrition FactsServing Size 1 packetServings Per Container Nutritional Information % Daily Value Total Carbohydrate 5g 2% Calories 25 Total Sugars 5g Includes Added Sugars 5g Vitamin C (as Ascorbic Acid, Zinc Ascorbate) 250mg Thiamin (as Thiamine Hydrochloride Juice Concentrate (Sambucus Nigra) 50mg WarningsKeep out of reach of children.
